channel.title: Components on Omni Design System
channel.description: Recent content in Components on Omni Design System

item.title: Buttons
item.description: Buttons are used for actions a user can take on a page. Their visual design is intended to make them stand out against content to make it more apparent what actions are available to a user. We do not disable buttons. Disabled buttons present accessibility issues and can confuse users as to how to enable them. So instead, we allow users to press any button and show a message if something must be done before that action can be taken.

item.title: Cards
item.description: Cards are a way to visually separate content, must always be on the Light Gray background @color-gray-light, and must always be accompanied by other cards (never use a single card alone.) "Buttons" Buttons are used for actions a user can take on a page. Their visual design is intended to make them stand out against content to make it more apparent what actions are available to a user. We do not disable buttons. Disabled buttons present accessibility issues and can confuse users as to how to enable them. So instead, we allow users to press any button and show a message if something must be done before that action can be taken.

"Cards" Cards are a way to visually separate content, must always be on the Light Gray background @color-gray-light, and must always be accompanied by other cards (never use a single card alone.)
